section.name: Jakarta Cactus
section.title: Jakarta Cactus
section.p: Jakarta previously hosted Cactus, a simple test framework for unit testing server-side java code.
In August 2011, Cactus was retired due to a lack of development community.
Cactus users are encouraged to switch to other techniques for testing.
The old Cactus website is available online here for archival purposes only.
Archived versions of Cactus may be downloaded from the Apache Archives.
